pages.text: As with most automation modpacks, AutoTerraFirmaCraft includes crushed ores, which provide a way to effectively double one's ores. Crushed ores are too big to fit inside vessels, so must be melted in a $(l:mechanics/charcoal_forge)Charcoal Forge$() or $(l:mechanics/crucible)Crucible$().$(br2)To $(thing)Alloy$() in a $(thing)Charcoal Forge$(), place a vessel in the top right slot and ores will melt into it.

Crushed ores are all worth 100mb, and can be produced with a $(thing)Millstone$() or $(thing)Crusher$().$(br2)Ores have a (2 x mb value)% chance of yielding a crushed ore when processed.$(br2)Some crushed ores are also used in the production of $(l:patchouli:create_integration/igneous_alloy)Igneous Alloy$().

pages.title: Deposit Refining
pages.text: Deposits can be refined in a Millstone or Crusher to produce a relevant small ore 90% of the time.$(br2)Unlike with ore crushing, this process has few downsides, though it's worth noting that $(thing)Cut Gems$() cannot be aquired this way.

pages.title: Raw Gem Refining
pages.text: Raw Gems can be converted both to $(thing)Gem Powders$() and $(thing)Cut Gems$() using Crushers or Querns and Millstones respectively.
